title: Look What God Is Doing!: True Stories of People Around the World Changed by the Gospel
features: Dick Eastman has traveled the world forty times over as president of Every Home for Christ, a ministry that uses home-to-home literature distribution to spread the gospel. Currently EHC has planted more than 2.6 billion gospel messages in 198 nations. Now Dick shares some of the powerful testimonies resulting from that work over the last 62 years.

These remarkable stories--from the jungles of Brazil to the foothills of the Himalayas--will spur the faith of believers everywhere, helping them see that, as Dick says, "finishing the task of the Great Commission, in our neighborhoods and throughout the earth, is really quite simple--and on its way to fulfillment."
description: Dr. Dick Eastman is the international president of Every Home for Christ, which has taken him around the world more than 40 times to every continent. He also serves as president of America's National Prayer Committee, which is instrumental in planning America's National Day of Prayer. Dick is the author of numerous bestselling books, including No Easy Road and The Hour That Changes the World, that have sold more than two million copies. He and his wife, Dee, make their home in Colorado Springs, Colorado.
